did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Marcus A. Smith, 1951-1924 was a Politician and U.S. Senator from Arizona, 1912-1921. This collection contains scrapbooks of clippings from Arizona newspapers dealing with Arizona politics and the Constitutional Convention of 1910, from the period July 18, 1910 to August 27, 1910.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Constitutional Convention Scrapbook (AZ 159). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Scrapbooks of clippings from Arizona newspapers dealing with Arizona politics and the Constitutional Convention of 1910, from the period July 18, 1910 to August 27, 1910.

relatedmaterial.p: Other materials relating to Marcus A. Smith may be found in Letter Book of Marcus A. Smith (AZ 160).
